Do you consider buffing her late game mana cost a little? She isn´t doing well at the moment, so a little buff could help her out. And she is probably the mage with the highest mana cost for one rotation of her basic abilities at late game.

I often have to fight with that too haha. Keep warding and you should be save. Spending 300g a game for 4 control wards is totally worth it.
I main toplane Gangplank, my Controll wards are often in the bush behind my tower, so I know when Lee will be ward hopping from behind my tower :P
I'm a simple man; I see Taliyah in a positive post and I upvote.

My last 2 seasons I've had around a 6 KDA on {{champion:103}} , roughly 150 games each season. Unfortunately I couldn't even keep a 50% winrate last season, and now this season I cant even keep a 4KDA.

But I'm sure its a lot harder on taliyah, considering she has no way to avoid deaths and she is much more skillshot bases. well done friend. :3


http://prntscr.com/dqtmyb

http://prntscr.com/dqtn5h

Well done in the last seasons ;) Good luck in Season 7
unfortunately ahri's hardest counters are all meta so its going terribly lol
Ahri has a 53.6% winrate and is one of the safest mages with very little counters outside of traditional assassin busters like Lissandra and Galio. What counters?

{{champion:254}} 0 counterplay oneshot on ahri unless you build zhonyas and run 10+ armor in runes
{{champion:134}} can get killed at lvl 4 if she lands her e
{{champion:67}}  1-2 shot by tumble crit
{{champion:55}} 4 shunpos in one trade makes it impossible to hit anything
{{champion:69}} will simply outrade you with sustained damage
{{champion:120}} do no damage to him but he will do 800 in one charge to you
{{champion:107}} will just w through charm
{{champion:102}} you wont do any damage to her regardless
{{champion:51}} headshot crits are fun
it takes ahri about 6 full rotations to kill any tank

You just listed every meta obnoxious champion.....Vi, Cait, Heca, and Vayne are easily candidates for top 5 strongest champions right now, with Rengar and Syndra close behind

Ahri laughs at Shyvana, she has one dash you have three. Ahri has a 57% winrate against Katarina, and a 55% against Cass.

oh but you know whats really fun? building void, rabadons and morrelo and doing less than 350 with your q against a bruiser with only spirit visage. when the oriana with the exact same ap as you completely facerolls the 2 tanks on your team that have 2 mr items with only ult and w.

~445 AP with those 3 items, a Doran's and 3 AP quints.

140 + .35 AP True Damage is about 296 damage (295.925 exact) and then the first hit is 296 more damage but is Magic and mitigated.

I know Ahri's damage is worthless against any MR, but you don't gotta lie man.
im just going off of the little numbers that pop up when you hit someone with an ability, also there was a locket in his inventory that i didn't see.
Odd choice when you can just look up the abilities base damage and AP ratio
those dont account for the resistance the person had

Well, yeah - that's why, when comparing abilities, you talk about the base damage and AP ratio since those don't change from game to game. Within any one game, there are so many variables which can skew how much damage you do to a target, such as target MR, your AP, your magic pen, and your level advantage/disadvantage over the target.

Thats a straight up lie and you know it. Ahri is one of the few mages with true damage - and her Q is an ability with high bases and great scaling. If they just have SV you will still hurt - especially if you have Void and Rabs?????

Honestly what game are you playing Ahri is actually better against tanky targets than Ori because the former at least has true damage and mobility.

Farming is overrated this season, just kill bot lane like 3-4 times and run it down mid.

Edit for those that think I'm joking or something

https://i.gyazo.com/64cdb3dc75a0c67696ad40d6842bab0a.png

It is an incredibly easy strategy with the ~2k gold swing 2 kills, fb tower, and dragon give.

At least someone's having a good time....

> [{quoted}](name=MrWasjig,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fWlW550L,comment-id=001d,timestamp=2017-01-03T17:45:34.057+0000)
>
> At least someone's having a good time....

The last few ranked games I played were absolut garbage. The past 2 days were like heaven for me. Winning so many games, making plays etc. 
Today is just a 180° turn. had a few games today that just were not winable. The enemies stomped us so hard. I lost my lane at least twice today and my roams were just so bad.
1 game I had 3 smurfs in my team. Let me tell you, Smurfs are not necessarily a good thing. The smurf riven lost her lane to a teemo and camp jungler. She flamed our jungler who was in his diamond promo to be low elo and trash for not ganking. The thresh and riven lost their will to play, because it was only their smurf. Only the smurf draven wanted to continue, and I am grateful for that, but we still lost the game.
Smurf are good when they carry you, obviously. But they are hell if they lose their lane, because of their high ego, they think everyone below challenger/master is trash.

And yes, the 3 were confirmed smurfs. each of them had less than 100 normal games, a really good KDA on most champs and a really high winrate.

I never have, nor ever will consider smurfs a good thing in any way what so ever.
If they carry you, you didn't deserve the win because you had an unfair advantage. If you lose, they're almost certain to flame everyone for it because there is no consequence to them losing that account.

Sure if they carry it's a free win, but it's like getting a free ice cream land in your hand out of nowhere. Only to realise it was flung from a child's hand after they were hit by a truck. It's free ice cream but there's a certain....unease about it. (extreme example I know, call it back to work blues xP).

But plenty of my matches in the last two weeks have been mostly garbage too. Some were a result of me doing poorly I don't deny that, but if I had a penny for games lost due to other lanes feeding like sin while I had a good/even lane phase, I'd be a rich man indeed by this point.

Still, congrats on them good stats. Like I said at least someone is having some success and enjoyment outta the new season.

;) ay

I consider myself a trash anivia player tho
https://gyazo.com/2a84a2e5cfe15f032da2f76c447ae1a0 kek

I'd be happy with a 1.0.
Unfortunately, I tend to get blown up by everyone when I'm warding. (>_>)
"Everyone" meaning both teams - in different ways.

Oh gosh. You should most definitely have at least a 1.0 KDA if not a 2.0 each game. Come late game, never ward alone! I always tell my team to come with me because the enemy will wait in bushes as 5 people for like 7 minutes straight just to catch you out it's absurd. Sometimes they say no, so I ask our team to get a blue trinket then. If all else fails I won't go to ward without my red trinket; I turn that on and go ward. It let's you see people with enough time to run

Teams exhibiting teamwork!?
You sir, are insane.

Soon(TM) I will have 100 games in ranked this season.

Nice job!

This is the 3rd time I seen you post your stats.
Do you want a cookie or something from this?
I get that you're a good Taliyah player, and proud of it too.
But instead of making these bragging posts, why not give advice to worse players?
I think I got the message that your KDA is good from the first two posts.


_Sorry for sounding rude, you are doing great. I actually do want you to keep us updated, just not so often that I see your stats 3 times in the span of a few days. Be humble. Give tips. Hope you do make it to masters. Good luck._
